title: New: dd elle – a note
body:
I’m a sucker for this sound.

Ever so soppy, dream-infused pop, drawing from the likes of Youth Lagoon and Neon Indian, **dd elle’s** debut track _a note_ is a definite grower. Barely audible vocals, repetitive synth sections and programmed violins swirl throughout, yet all pinned down by an ear for melody that the aforementioned artists would kill for. A promising start no doubt. Check out _a note_ below.
